Package model

Class ShiftControl

java.lang.Object
model.ShiftControl
public class ShiftControl
extends java.lang.Object
This class allows create users and shifts.
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Jhon Ijaji.

  • Constructor Summary

    ShiftControl()
    This method allows create a users list and shifts list.

  • Method Details

    • addUser

      public void addUser​(int docType, java.lang.String id, java.lang.String names, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String phone, java.lang.String address)
      This method allows add an user in the list.
      post: The text has been changed.
      Parameters:
      docType - The document type as an integer for select the indicate type.
      id - The user document number.
      names - The user names.
      lastName - The user last names.
      phone - The user phone.
      address - The user address.

    • selectDT

      public java.lang.String selectDT​(int docType)
      This method allows select the indicate document type.
      Parameters:
      docType - The document type to select.
      Returns:
      A text with the document type.

    • registerShift

      public java.lang.String registerShift​(java.lang.String id) throws AlreadyHasShiftException
      This method allows assign an user to one shift.
      Parameters:
      id - The user document number.
      Returns:
      A report of the assigned shift.
      Throws:
      AlreadyHasShiftException - If the user has an active shift throws this exception.
      java.lang.NullPointerException - If the user object is null throws this exception.

    • selectUser

      public User selectUser​(java.lang.String id)
      This method allows search an user with the document number.
      Parameters:
      id - The user document number.
      Returns:
      The user searched.
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - If the list of users is empty throws this exception.

    • checkUser

      public void checkUser​(java.lang.String id) throws ExistException
      This method allows check if an user already exist in the list.
      Parameters:
      id - The user document number.
      Throws:
      ExistException - If the user is found in the list throws this exception.

    • addShift

      public void addShift()
      This method allows create a shift with the indicate code.

    • attendShift

      public java.lang.String attendShift​(int status)
      This method allows attend a shift.
      Parameters:
      status - The status to select.

    • selectToAttendShift

      public Shift selectToAttendShift()
      This method allows select the next shift to attend.
      Returns:
      The next shift to attend.

    • checkUserShift

      public Shift checkUserShift​(java.lang.String id)
      This method allows search the user shift
      Parameters:
      id - The user document number.
      Returns:
      The shift with user assigned and not attended.

    • getUsers

      public java.util.ArrayList<User> getUsers()
      This method allows get the users list.
      Returns:
      The users list.

    • getShifts

      public java.util.ArrayList<Shift> getShifts()
      This method allows get the shifts list.
      Returns:
      The shift list.
